itemDescription: British scholar specialising in Elizabethan, Jacobean and 19th century English literature

wikipedia_page.main: Joan Rees (1923 – December 2, 2014) was a British scholar specialising in Elizabethan, Jacobean and 19th century English literature. A professor emerita at the University of Birmingham, she won the British Academy's Rose Mary Crawshay Prize in 1979. She was a Fellow of the Royal Society of Literature.
